title: Trump to Sign Executive Order Requiring Agencies to Offset Administrative Spending Increases
text:
President Trump is planning to sign an executive order as soon as this week requiring administrative action by a federal agency that boosts federal spending to be offset with spending cuts elsewhere, according to people familiar with the matter.

The order would effectively impose a “pay as you go” requirement on federal agencies, enforcing a 2005 memo from the Office of Management and Budget that required federal agency leaders to offset the cost of any administrative action that would increase mandatory spending, the people...
description: The order would effectively impose a “pay as you go” requirement on federal agencies to offset the cost of administrative action that would increase spending.
